entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
